dict.acceptation: 想，设想；想像；料想，猜想；误认为；

sent.orig: You can't imagine having kids until you do, and then you can't imagine life without them.
sent.trans: 你永远无法想像有孩子的日子直到你有了之后，而到时候你就无法想象没有他们的日子。

sent.orig: I imagine he's evil from birth, which is a terrible thing to imagine.
sent.trans: 我猜测他从出生起就这么邪恶了，这个事情设想起来很可怕。

sent.orig: But imagine, just imagine, having some right now.
sent.trans: 但是想象，仅只想象，马上有一些想象。

sent.orig: They can think themselves into other people's minds, imagine themselves into other people's places.
sent.trans: 他们可以将心比心、设身处地的理解他人。

sent.orig: I found it odd to imagine a nation of convivial diners surrendering their birthright.
sent.trans: 我发现很难想象让这样一个喜欢热热闹闹吃饭的民族放弃他们的习惯。
